article_text: Politics is boring because candidates and parties are out of ideas, relying instead on recreating stale strategies from the past. It doesn’t have to be that. But it will take candidates willing to admit government shutdowns and routine scandal-mongering are aging relics, not legitimate tools for fixing anything.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Democrats, Republicans, Congress, Obama, shutdown, government, politics, ideas
article_metadata.title: Dave Helling: A government shutdown? This movie was boring last time | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
But it will take candidates willing to admit government shutdowns and routine scandal-mongering are aging relics, not legitimate tools for fixing anything.
Politics is boring because candidates and parties are out of ideas, relying instead on recreating stale strategies from the past.
It doesn’t have to be that.
